name: The Under Alley Sepulcher
description:
The Old Trash-tament foretells of a prophecy: every 100 years a raccoon is chosen by Mother Raccoon to travel to the Under Alley Sepulcher, where they must eat the immortal flesh, thus fulfilling their role as Mother Raccoon's champion and become the raccoon ruler.  

You are chosen by Mother Raccoon! You must travel to the Under Alley Sepulcher and eat the immortal flesh. But watch out, the choices you make will directly impact the ending of your journey.

sources:

 Type-face: Font : https://www.1001fonts.com/pixel-fonts.html?page=1

Joystick made by Raymond Larabie

Night time sound: Sound Effect from Pixabay
